column1: This document is an index of NHS analytical conference talks for that material, and is rendered out in searchable form at this URLand github repo:

For that reason, please do not modify column names in this table without also doing the same in the repo, or raising an issue in the repo to flag that the data processing will need to be updated at the next upload of this file.
To update the BOK, export this worksheet as a UTF8 CSV, and commit it to the "data_public" directory of the repo.
To download from Excel go to File -> Export -> Download as CSV UTF8
ONLY PUBLIC CONTENT MUST BE ADDED TO THIS FILE
IF THE CONTENT COULD NOT BE PROJECTED ONTO THE SIDE OF THE HOUSES OF PARLIAMENT WITHOUT CAUSING CONTROVERSY, IT DOES NOT BELONG HERE - PLEASE REMOVE IT
